argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_recn | |- ( B e. RR -> B e. CC ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_3ad2ant2 | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> B e. CC ) |
| 3 |  | #P_modcl | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( A mod M ) e. RR ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_recnd | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( A mod M ) e. CC ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( A mod M ) e. CC ) |
| 6 | 2, 5 | #P_addcomd | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( B + ( A mod M ) ) = ( ( A mod M ) + B ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( ( B + ( A mod M ) ) mod M ) = ( ( ( A mod M ) + B ) mod M ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_modaddmod | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( ( ( A mod M ) + B ) mod M ) = ( ( A + B ) mod M ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_recn | |- ( A e. RR -> A e. CC ) |
| 10 |  | #P_addcom | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( A + B ) = ( B + A ) ) |
| 11 | 9, 1, 10 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR ) -> ( A + B ) = ( B + A ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR ) -> ( ( A + B ) mod M ) = ( ( B + A ) mod M ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_3adant3 | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( ( A + B ) mod M ) = ( ( B + A ) mod M ) ) |
| 14 | 7, 8, 13 | #P_3eqtrd | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( ( B + ( A mod M ) ) mod M ) = ( ( B + A ) mod M ) ) |
